Mr. NADLER. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to honor Anita Altman, a  distinguished New Yorker and cherished member of our community, who  will celebrate her 80th birthday on June 2, 2025.

Anita has devoted her life to building a…

…Billings, Caitlin Cahill, Keith Engel, Aditi Ginuga, Anne  Leland, Cathy Olson, Dave Olson, Paula Ramaley, Cole Roepke, Adaline  Shinkle, Brad Shinkle, Diane Sjolander, and Anita Smithson.

The people of Minnesota's Third Congressional District are fortunate  to have them as neighbors, friends, and community members.

Finally, I want to recognize the need to succor. You said: Why are we  here? I am here because Anita said I needed to be here to recognize  Rabbi Berman. Anita is a fellow South Carolinian. She is a trustee at  Yeshiva University, and she has contributed to our State, to the…

Mr. ROGERS of Alabama. Mr. Speaker, I rise to recognize the  retirement of Anita Bedwell, a City Councilwoman for Rainbow City,  Alabama.

Anita was born in Rainbow City to Eugene and Loretta Wimpee on August  27, 1961, along with her sisters, Lisa Abernathy…
